formattedAddress: 230 Grand St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 230 Grand St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: Great place to get vaccine shots! My daughter and I both went there for Covid and Flu shot at the same visit. Thao, the pharmacist, is very kind, friendly and informative about the vaccine’s information. Plus, the shots administered by her wasn’t painful at all. Good skill! Will come back in the future.

Thao, the pharmacist, is very kind, friendly and informative about the vaccine’s information. Plus, the shots administered by her wasn’t painful at all. Good skill! Will come back in the future.

originalText.text: The best pharmacy , very nice staffs. Instructions for how to take your medication are explained very clear. I am confident to have my family medication fill at this pharmacy. Highly recommend this pharmacy.

text.text: The best pharmacy , very nice staffs. Instructions for how to take your medication are explained very clear. I am confident to have my family medication fill at this pharmacy. Highly recommend this pharmacy.

originalText.text:
Becareful to this pharmacy. Need to check the expired date on the medicine before you bring it home. They will give you the expired medicine and give you unreasonable excuses. After we find that they have the new one, they still try to lie to us and don’t want to show us the new one with professional excuses. Some of the employers very rude. Very disappointed as long to know this pharmacy.
I called the cops and your pharmacy explained to the cops and my husband with the same explaination. They didn’t know that you have the Gk5745 which expired on nov 2023 but why you give us the GF 6000 which is expired on April 2023. Your employees asked us to ask government about it. We want to buy the new one and you guys didn’t let us buy. What kind of service is it? We just don’t want to eat the expired medicine. You give us hard time. The medicine GF 6000 is expired on April 2023 and you keep told us that the government extended to February 2024 and you said all the medicines you have is the same one. You lie. We found that you have the GK 5745 that expired on November 2023, why you don’t want to give us this one to replace the gf6000 which one expired more longer.

Additional:
You can call me anytime because I don’t know how to find you. My husband was over there today around 1 hour but we didn’t see you show up. And your pharmacist lied to the cops that my husband bothers your business over there 3 hours.

originalText.text: Super recommend this place for shots for kids! It was such a pleasant experience. The lady who gave my kids their Covid shots was so kid friendly / patient and she even gave them toys after their shot. The staff at the counter was very helpful too.( she filled up most of the forms for us) The adults also got flu shots at the same time. Wished I known this place earlier.

The staff at the counter was very helpful too.( she filled up most of the forms for us) The adults also got flu shots at the same time. Wished I known this place earlier.

originalText.text: Came here for a Covid booster and they were absolutely wonderful. It was a same day walk-in appointment and they had all the options available. They were very thorough throughout the whole process. The pharmacist who administered the shot was so kind and calming. You can tell they have a lot of regular customers they care about which is such a nice thing to see.
